text: "More" is a song by American singer Usher. It was released from his album Raymond v. Raymond (2010). It was written by Charles Hinshaw, Usher and RedOne. It was produced by RedOne. It was released on March 16, 2010. It became the third promotional recording for the album. == Release history == Country Date Format (Version) Label United States March 16, 2010 Digital download (Album Version) LaFace, Jive Records November 22, 2010 Digital download (Single Version) United Kingdom December 12, 2010 Digital download (Single Version), (Club Remixes EP) RCA Records, Sony Music December 13, 2010 FM Radio (Single Version) Germany March 4, 2011 CD single Sony Music Entertainment ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2010–11) Peak position scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" German Airplay ChartGerman Airplay Chart , Retrieved on 2011-06-03 14 scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" Russia (Airplay) 141 scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2011) Position Australia (ARIA) 57 Austria (IFPI) 73 Belgium (Ultratop Flanders) 41 Belgium (Ultratop Wallonia) 71 Canada (Canadian Hot 100) 23 Germany (Official German Charts) 38 Hungary (Rádiós Top 40) 18 Netherlands (Dutch Top 40) 23 Netherlands (Single Top 100) 46 Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) 79 Switzerland (Schweizer Hitparade)http://hitparade.ch/year.asp?key=2011 29 UK Singles (Official Charts Company) 192 US Billboard Hot 100 61 US Dance/Mix Show Airplay (Billboard) 14 US Mainstream Top 40 (Billboard) 35 ==References== Category:2010 songs Category:Usher songs
